message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, Bob, but I'm afraid $12000 is below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $20000. This is the lowest price I can go, and I believe it's still a great value for this exceptional product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $20000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it offers.
